title: Looking for highly ranked players from Macquarie University
body:
Hi, if you're a high ranked player (Plat and above), can play top lane or adc and you're from Macquarie University, please add me on Redcoat. If you're keen message me :)

Current ranks:

Top : ??
Jungle: Plat 2
Mid: Plat 2
ADC: ??
Support: Diamond 4

Our current ranked 5's team is Plat 2, so we have experience in ranked 5s.

replies.body: Hey guys I main support, can play any support champ though preferably prefer the tanky ones e.g. Leona. Can also mid and top lane with my weakest roles being jungle and adc

Hi guys, I'm a diamond 3 adc main studying at MQU. IGN: QuackCocaine

So here's the thing, I have some people I know (a couple challengers) who asked me if I wanted to play in their team however I'm not totally sure if they will end up getting a full roster together so I'm looking around just in case. (I know that's kind of a 'on-the-fence' position). Anyway, if you want to add me and play a couple of games or whatever. Like, even if we don't end up playing together for this tournament, it doesn't hurt anyone right?
Yeah no worries. We'd be happy to trial you out we're still exploring options right now. Add me on Redcoat and I'll give you a message if we're open :)
